channel.title: A Few Questions For you aswome coders
channel.description:
well first off, i'm not embaressed by the questions i ask because i might not be very good at coding but still, here are my questions.
1.whats the diference a client and server? i know the client is the downloaded version with all the files, and the servre just the i-p thing but whats' the diference?
2.how do i make it so that accounts are created (for ingame rs) by registering on my forum?
3.(easy question) how do i change the name of the servre and the bg picture for my client (on the log-in page)
4.i've seen in seom servers, the image around the compass/map, and the text area, you could have a cool diferent style/image/watever u wanna call it, how can i add something like that? (i edited this thread so i cud ask this question)
5.how do i make, and put a custom made item into my server? ty
6.can i not make the server public but still edit it and go ingame to see how my servre is coming along?(i edited again to add this)

item.title: A Few Questions For you aswome coders
item.dc:creator: @WhiteWolves WhiteWolves
item.description:
@WhiteWolves wrote:

[quote=“owner injection, post:2, topic:303258”]hey man well i got ur answers.

  1. im not sure about this one but, honestly, i wouldnt want to do that as it limits the number of players u could have[/quote]

it may limit my players, but then again, if u can make an acc on the log-in page, then some cud just macro/bot, make masive amout of accs,
lag the server, and spam, easily…

and thnx for the reply to the other questions

Read full topic
item.source: A Few Questions For you aswome coders

item.title: A Few Questions For you aswome coders
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

  1. BG - Go into your client’s sprites folder, and look for the current background.
    Edit it using paint (DO NOT MAKE IT ANY BIGGER THAN IT IS) and make sure to ONLY change it by editing THAT EXACT PICTURE. Otherwise it may stop working. ^^"

Read full topic
item.source: A Few Questions For you aswome coders

item.title: A Few Questions For you aswome coders
item.dc:creator: @owner_injection owner injection
item.description:
@owner_injection wrote:

hey man well i got ur answers.

  1. a server is the base of the rsps. u dont play the rsps on the server the server is basically the configuration of your rsps.

  2. im not sure about this one but, honestly, i wouldnt want to do that as it limits the number of players u could have

  3. ok in order to change the name of yer server, go into gui.java and replace watever the old name of ur server was with the one u want

i hope that helps

Read full topic
item.source: A Few Questions For you aswome coders
